name: A Way Out (itch)
description:
In This Game You will be able to play as a cannon. Your Goal is to survive.  You will need to shoot the moving wall in order to stay way! you can recharge your bullets by catching the blue balls.

I am 17 and this is my first game published! I love making games! and i hope that Ludum Dare stays the same so that i can do another game in the next year!
